channel.title: üî• Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1504654604079820800
item.description:
I don't like the assertion against open data that "such data should only be accessed by those with credentials".
That asserts that the public doesn't have academics, scientists, & professionals to contextualize open data.
That is asserting that the public is dumb.

item.title: #en @ 1504596228088414208
item.description: Contributing to Indigenous genomics efforts for rare disease diagnosis has been the most humbling work in my open data career.
